info.name: Mozilla Dark (Bugzilla, SuMo, wiki, developer)
info.description:
A dark theme for .mozilla.org domains.  I will be adding sites as I go, and making fixes as needed.

Currently includes support for: bugzilla.mozilla.org, support.mozilla.org, wiki.mozilla.org, developer.mozilla.org

Project is hosted on GitHub, please report any issues there:

https://github.com/overdodactyl/Mozilla-Dark/

data.title: Tables and other elements are still fully white
Not complete for MDN; lots of white/bright elements, still
